definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: He removed the family to Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 他把全家迁移到了香港。

sentences.english: The Chinese values the happy cheerful atmosphere that the family when spending the New Year reunites very much.
sentences.chinese: 中国人非常看重过年时全家团聚的喜乐气氛。

sentences.english: Yesterday, the new family was discharged from the St Charles Medical Centre in Bend, Oregon.
sentences.chinese: 昨天全家从俄勒冈州本德市圣查理医疗中心出院。

sentences.english: Luke took a picture of his family.
sentences.chinese: 卢克给全家照了张相片。

sentences.english: I took out my wallet and nervously fumbled for the pictures of my family.
sentences.chinese: 我拿出了皮夹，慌手慌脚地翻出了我的全家福照片。

sentences.english: FamilyMart is expected to launch a coffee delivery service this coming winter.
sentences.chinese: 全家超商则预计在今年冬天推出咖啡外送服务。

sentences.english: Coincidently, all of my family members were born in the same month.
sentences.chinese: 很凑巧的，我们全家都是同一个月份出生的。

sentences.english: The family and I planned to leave Monday for a two-week vacation in California.
sentences.chinese: 我们全家计划星期一去加州两个星期渡假。
我们全家都去做了心理咨询。

sentences.english: My aunt's family treated us with familiarly.
sentences.chinese: 我姑姑全家对我们很热情。

sentences.english: They all reverently bowed their heads and hearts.
sentences.chinese: 全家人都虔诚地低下了头，在心里致敬。

sentences.english: Probably, if you started your tub, you'd wake the whole house.
sentences.chinese: 如果你开始洗澡，你会把他们全家都吵起来。

sentences.english: Wishing you and yours a merry Cristmas this holiday season.
sentences.chinese: 至此佳节祝您全家节日快乐。

sentences.english: An earthquake drill can teach your family what to do in an earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 防震演习可以让你们全家知道如何应对地震。

sentences.english: Generally several extended families live in such a compound.
sentences.chinese: 通常全家人生活在一个大院里。

sentences.english: Finally, we watch TV together at home in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 最后，晚上全家人聚在家里看电视。

definition: the old and the young/the youngest member of the family
daughter's son/grandson/descendant via the female line
